bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: lib_armv6/string_misc.c:58:20: fatal error: string.h: No such file or directory #include <string.h>
compilation terminated.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): arm-none-eabi-gcc-cs-6.1.0-2.fc25.x86_64
How reproducible:
Steps to Reproduce: 1. wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/christinaa/rpi-open-firmware/master/arm_chainloader/lib_armv6/string_misc.c -P /tmp 2. arm-none-eabi-gcc /tmp/string_misc.c 3. check_output
Actual results: [indy@localhost rpi-open-firmware]$ arm-none-eabi-gcc /tmp/string_misc.c /tmp/string_misc.c:58:20: fatal error: string.h: No such file or directory #include <string.h> ^ compilation terminated.
Expected results: compilation passed
Additional info:

do you have arm-none-eabi-newlib installed? string.h does not live in gcc, but glibc for which newlib is the place where to look at. For me your reproducer compiles without problem (I have arm-none-eabi-newlib installed)

works
$ wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/christinaa/rpi-open-firmware/master/arm_chainloader/lib_armv6/string_misc.c -P /tmp --2017-07-10 10:26:16-- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/christinaa/rpi-open-firmware/master/arm_chainloader/lib_armv6/string_misc.c Resolving raw.githubusercontent.com (raw.githubusercontent.com)... 151.101.36.133 Connecting to raw.githubusercontent.com (raw.githubusercontent.com)|151.101.36.133|:443... connected. HTTP request sent, awaiting response... 200 OK Length: 3258 (3.2K) [text/plain] Saving to: ‘/tmp/string_misc.c’
string_misc.c 100%[=====================================================================================================================================>] 3.18K --.-KB/s in 0s
2017-07-10 10:26:20 (80.6 MB/s) - ‘/tmp/string_misc.c’ saved [3258/3258]
$ arm-none-eabi-gcc -c /tmp/string_misc.c $ ls /tmp/string_misc.o /tmp/string_misc.o
$ rpm -q arm-none-eabi-gcc-cs arm-none-eabi-newlib arm-none-eabi-gcc-cs-7.1.0-2.fc25.x86_64 arm-none-eabi-newlib-2.5.0-1.fc25.noarch
